thread.title: Bristol City 0 Fulham 2: Lucas Piazon and Tom Cairney strike to keep The Cottagers in play-off hunt
thread.title_full: Bristol City 0 Fulham 2: Lucas Piazon and Tom Cairney strike to keep The Cottagers in play-off hunt

author: rforrester
title: Bristol City 0 Fulham 2: Lucas Piazon and Tom Cairney strike to keep The Cottagers in play-off hunt
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments STRIKES from Lucas Piazon and Tom Cairney gifted Fulham their third consecutive win to mount pressure on the top six. 
Piazon, on loan from Chelsea, delicately lifted the ball over City keeper Fabian Giefer to give the Cottagers the lead on 17 minutes. Reuters 1 Tom Cairney celebrates giving Fulham a two-goal advantage 
And Bristol City had a mountain to climb seven minutes after half-time when Fulham’s pressure proved too much for the Championship strugglers when Cairney’s strike found the top corner. 
More to follow…
